lead_paragraph: NUBILE--Donato "Danny," Born June 06, 1918, died peacefully on March 23, 2016, at the age of 97 years old in the Bronx, NY. He served in WWII with the Italian Army. His service and his concern for everyone around him knew no bounds and he never let up, not for a day. With a razor sharp mind, he was always thinking of ways to help others. He loved, he gave, he shared, and he lived a long beautiful life. A soldier, a mason, a son, a husband, a brother, we love you forever and will miss you good friend. May you rest in peace with the love of your life "Grace." A memorial service for Danny will be held on Friday, March 25, 2016 at John Dormi & Sons Funeral Home, 1121 Morris Park Ave., Bronx, NY 5pm-9pm, and burial service on March 26, 2016 at Woodlawn Cemetery, Webster Ave., East 233rd Street, Bronx, NY at 10:30am. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  NUBILE, DONATO "DANNY," BORN JUNE 06
